data.text: Deenei di hagatau o nia maadua mmaadua o Jesus Christ, di hagadili o David, di hagadili mai Abraham.
Deenei di hagatau o nia maadua mmaadua mai Abraham, gaa dae gi King David:
Judah tamana o Perez mo Zerah (di nau dinana go Tamar),
Ram tamana o Amminadab,
Salmon tamana o Boaz (dono dinana go Rahab),
Jesse tamana o King David.
Solomon tamana o Rehoboam,
Asa tamana o Jehoshaphat,
Uzziah tamana o Jotham,
Hezekiah tamana o Manasseh,
Josiah tamana o Jehoiachin mo ono duaahina daane, i di madagoaa digau Israel ne lahi gi Babylon.1.11 2 Kings 24.14-15; 2 Kronikel 36.10; Jeremiah 27.20
Di hagatau o nia maadua mmaadua i muli di nadau lahi gi Babylon, gaa dae gi di haanau o Jesus Christ:
Zerubbabel tamana o Abiud,
Azor tamana o Zadok,
Eliud tamana o Eleazar,
Jacob tamana o Joseph.

Malaa, nia adu daangada i muli o Abraham gaa dae gi David le e madangaholu maa haa. Nia adu daangada i muli o David gaa dae gi di lahi gi Babylon e madangaholu maa haa. Nia adu daangada i muli di lahi gi Babylon gaa dae gi di haanau o Mesaia e madangaholu maa haa.
Deenei di hai o di haanau o Jesus Christ. Dono dinana go Mary ne hagababa ang gi Joseph, gei meemaa digi haga hai lodo. Mary gu iloo bolo ia gu hai dama i di Hagataalunga Dabu.1.18 Luke 1.27
Joseph taane hai hegau donu, hagalee hiihai e haga langaadia Mary i mua nia daangada, ga hagamaanadu bolo ia ga haga lawa hagammuni hua di nau hagababa.

I dono hagamamaanadu hua beenei, tangada di langi o Dimaadua ga hanimoi i lodo di moe, ga helekai, “Joseph, tangada mai di hagadili o David, goe hudee madagu di lahi a Mary e hai doo lodo, idimaa, mee e hai dama i di Hagataalunga Dabu.

Mee ga haanau dana dama daane, gei goe gi wanga ina dono ingoo go Jesus1.21 Jesus: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Yihowah e haga mouli”, dono hadinga bolo Mee ga haga dagaloaha ana daangada gi daha mo nadau huaidu.”1.21 Luke 1.31
Nia mee huogodoo aanei ne belee haga kila aga nia helekai Dimaadua ang gi soukohp bolo gi haga iloo ina,
“Tama ahina madammaa ga hai dama,
Joseph ga ala aga, gaa lodo gi Mary gii hai be nia helekai tangada di langi o Dimaadua.
Malaa, Joseph digi haga gila ina di hiihai mouli o taga hai lodo ang gi Mary i mua di haanau di tama. Joseph gaa wanga di ingoo o Maa go Jesus.1.25 Luke 2.21
